meanings.sent1: The cruel slaveholder forced the slaves to work long hours in the fields.
meanings.sent2: The slaveholder sold his slaves at the market for profit.
meanings.sent3: The greedy slaveholder tried to make the slaves do all his chores for him.
meanings.sent4: The slaveholder's power over the slaves was absolute, like a king ruling over his subjects.
meanings.sent5: The image of the slaveholder with a whip in hand is a haunting reminder of a dark past.

meanings.definition: One who holds slaves in bondage.
meanings.sent1: The slaveholder kept the slaves locked up in chains to prevent them from escaping.
meanings.sent2: The slaveholder treated the slaves as property to be bought and sold.
meanings.sent3: The lazy slaveholder expected the slaves to do all the work while he lounged in his mansion.
meanings.sent4: The slaveholder's grip on the slaves was like a vice, squeezing out their freedom.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the slaveholder's cruelty lingers in the minds of those who suffered under him.
